subCategories.title: Betika Super League - Football
subCategories.content:
• Final Result: Who will win the match? Place a bet predicting whether the Home team will win, a Draw will occur, or the Away team will win (1 = home team, X = draw, 2 = away team).
  • Double Chance: Place a bet on two of three possible exclusive outcomes. You can win the bet only when one of two predictions must be true.
    • 1/X: Winning bet if the home team wins or if there is a draw
    • X/2: Winning bet if there is a draw, or the away team wins
    • 1/2: Winning bet if the home team wins or the away team wins
  • Halftime/Fulltime: Bet on the predictions of halftime and fulltime results of the match. You can win the bet only when both predictions are correct. (Selections: 1/1, 1/X, 1/2, X/1, X/X, X/2, 2/1, 2/X, 2/2)
  • Goal Goal/No Goal: Place a bet predicting whether one of the teams will not score, or that both will score in a football match. (Goal Goal: Each team will score at least one goal; No Goal: at least one team will not score)
  • Over/Under: Bet on the total number of goals scored during the match being over or under the given number (e.g., 1.5)
  • 1X2+Over/Under: Bet on the combined predictions of the end result of the match (Home team win, draw, Away team win) and the winning goals. Both predictions must be true to win. (e.g., Home + over 1.5 means Home team will win and over 1.5 goals will be scored, hence the winning result can be 2-0, 2-1 and etc.)
  • Total Goals: Bet on the prediction of the total number of goals that will be scored in a match.
  • Correct Score: Bet on the prediction of the exact final score of a match in the correct order (Home-Away, e.g., 1-0 means Home team will score 1 goal and away team will not score.)
  • MultiGoal: Bet on the range which the number of goals scored in a match falls within. (e.g., 0-2 means total goals between 0-2 goals scored. )
  • Asian Handicap: Bet on the team that will win the match taking into account the handicap assigned to the selected team (ex. -1, for the bet to win the selected team must win by 2 or more goals. If it wins by 1 goals the bet is void, if it draws or loses, the bet is lost)

subCategories.content: • Final Result: Who will win the match? Place a bet predicting whether the Home team will win, a Draw will occur, or the Away team will win (1 = home team, X = draw, 2 = away team).

subCategories.title: Virtual Horse Racing
subCategories.content:
• VIRTUAL HORSE RACING
  • Win– bet on the selected horse to win the race (e.g., Horse No.1 finishes 1st).
  • Place(1-2) – bet on the selected horse to finish 1st or 2nd position in a race. (e.g., Selection 1: Horse No.1 finishes 1st or 2nd).
  • Show(1-3) – bet on the selected horse to finish 1st, 2nd or 3rd position in the race (e.g., Selection 1: Horse No.1 finishes 1st, 2nd or 3rd).
  • Even/Odd– bet on horse No. Even (2/4/6) or horse No.Odd (1/3/5) as winner.
  • Over/Under– bet on the winner horse is over or under No.3.5 (Selection Over: Horse No.4/No.5/No.6 finishes 1st; Selection Under: Horse No.1/No.2/No.3 finishes 1st).
  • Exacta– bet on the 2 horses finishing in 1st and 2nd positions, in the order predicted. Both predictions must be correct for the bet to win. (e.g., Selection 1, 2: Horse No.1 finishes 1st, Horse No.2 finishes 2nd).
  • Quinella– bet on the 2 horses you expect to finish 1st and 2nd in any order. Both predictions must be correct for the bets to win. (e.g., Selection1&2: Horses No.1 and No.2 finish 1st and 2nd in any order).
  • Trifecta– bet on the 3 horses you expect to finish 1st, 2nd and 3rd in the correct order. All three predictions must be correct for the bet to win. (e.g., Selection 1, 2, 3: Horse No.1 finishes 1st, Horse No.2 finishes 2nd, Horse No.3 finishes 3rd).

subCategories.title: Virtual Dog Races
subCategories.content:
• VIRTUAL DOG RACES
  • Winner– bet on the selected dog to win the race. (e.g., Dog No.1 finishes 1st).
  • Place(1-2) – bet on the selected dog to finish 1st or 2nd position in a race. (e.g., Selection 1: Dog No.1 finishes 1st or 2nd).
  • Show(1-3) – bet on the selected dog to finish 1st, 2nd or 3rd position in the race. (e.g., Selection 1: Dog No.1 finishes 1st, 2nd or 3rd).
  • Even/Odd– bet on No. Even (2/4/6) or No.Odd (1/3/5) to finish 1st position in a race.
  • Over/Under– bet on the winner dog is over or under No.3.5 (Selection Over: Dog No.4/No.5/No.6 finishes 1st; Selection Under: Dog No.1/No.2/No.3 finishes 1st).
  • Exacta– bet on the 2 dogs finishing in 1st and 2nd positions, in the order predicted. Both predictions must be correct for the bet to win. (e.g., Selection 1, 2: Dog No.1 finishes 1st, Dog No.2 finishes 2nd)
  • Quinella– bet on the 2 dogs you expect to finish 1st and 2nd in any order. Both predictions must be correct for the best to win. (e.g., Selection1&2: Dog No.1 and No.2 finish 1st and 2nd in any order).
  • Trifecta– bet on the 3 dogs you expect to finish 1st, 2nd and 3rd in the correct order. All three predictions must be correct for the bet to win. (e.g., Selection 1, 2, 3: Dog No.1 finishes 1st, Dog No.2 finishes 2nd, Dog No.3 finishes 3rd).

data.title: Betika Website and Mobile App Privacy Policy

subCategories.title: Introduction
subCategories.content:
At Betika we are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy and maintaining your confidence and trust. This privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") is used to inform you as to how we process your Personal Data, how and why we collect, use, and disclose it when you visit our Channels (as hereinafter defined) regardless of where you visit it from, and tells you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

This Privacy Policy should be read and applied together with the Betika General Terms and Conditions ("Terms and Conditions").

subCategories.title: Definitions and Interpretation
subCategories.content:
The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meaning as in our Terms and Conditions. However, for the purposes of this Privacy Policy and the Introduction above, unless the context otherwise requires:

  1. "Applicable Laws" means the Data Protection Laws and any relevant international data protection laws;
  2. "Betika Service(s)" has the meaning given to it in the Terms and Conditions and "Services" shall be construed accordingly;
  3. "Channel(s)" means the Betika website, mobile app, social media platforms and any other platforms used to offer the Betika Services;
  4. "Customer(s)" means registered users of the Betika Service;
  5. "Data Protection Laws" means the Data Protection Act, 2019, as amended and "Local Data Protection Laws" shall be construed accordingly;
  6. "Personal Data" means any information about an identified or identifiable natural person and "Personal Data" shall be construed accordingly;

  1. "Sensitive Personal Data" has the meaning given to it in the Data Protection Act, 2019;

Interpretation

  1. In addition to the above definitions, unless the context requires otherwise: the singular shall include the plural and vice versa;
  2. A reference to any one gender, whether masculine or feminine includes the other two;
  3. A reference to "We" "Us" "Our" is a reference to Shop and Deliver Limited, Betika and or its successors in title and assigns.

subCategories.title: How Your Personal Data is Collected
subCategories.content:
We collect your Personal Data when you interact with us or use our Services in any of the following ways (this list is subject to amendment from time to time as per clause 19 below):

  1. Visit, access or use any of the Betika Services, events, business premises and / or Channels;
  2. Subscribe or register to our Services and products, including but not limited to: betting and gaming services offered at www.betika.com, promotional offers, tournaments, and competitions;
  3. Participate in any of Betika’s platforms, for example discussion boards on our website or social media platforms, promotions or surveys, report a problem with our mobile app, website, Services or products, or ask for more information on a Service or product;
  4. Interact with us as a supplier, agent, merchant, or dealer of Betika Services; and
  5. From third party sources, where:
    1. your Personal Data is contained in a public record;
    2. where you have deliberately made your Personal Data public;
    3. where you have given us consent to collect your Personal Data from a third party;
    4. where you have an incapacity, and the guardian appointed has given us consent to collect your Personal Data from a third party;
    5. where our collection from a third party would not prejudice your interests; and
    6. where our collection of your Personal Data from a third party is necessary:
      • to prevent, detect, investigate, prosecute, and punish a crime;
      • to enforce a law that imposes a pecuniary penalty; or
      • to protect your interests or the interests of another person.

subCategories.title: The Personal Data We Collect about You
subCategories.content:
We may collect, use, and store different kinds of Personal Data about you, which we have grouped together as follows:

  1. Identity Information - includes name, ID number, age, mobile number, address, date of birth, email address, gender, CCTV images when you visit our premises;
  2. Technical Information - includes the type of mobile device you use, unique device identifiers such as internet protocol (IP) address of your computer or smart phone, your login information, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform, mobile network information and other technology on the devices you use to access our Channels;
  3. Financial Information - includes your transaction information when you withdraw from or deposit into your Betika account, information we obtain from fraud prevention agencies, Anti-Money Laundering agencies and any government regulator;
  4. Contact Information - includes information stored on your device, including contact lists, call logs, SMS logs, social media friends, followers, and contacts, contact lists from other social media accounts, photos, videos, or other digital content;
  5. Log Information - includes details of your use of any of our Channels; including, but not limited to, traffic data, location data, weblogs, and other communication data;

  1. Visit Information – includes information about your visit, including the full Uniform Resource Locators (URL) clickstream to, through and from our App, system, and network (including date and time); Services or products you viewed or searched for or requested; page response times, download errors, length of visits to certain pages, page interaction information and any phone number used to request a Service or call our customer service number;
  2. Location Information - using GPS technology or other location finding services to determine your current location;
  3. Profile Information - includes your social media profiles, your username and password, your interests, feedback personal preferences collected in surveys and recordings.

subCategories.title: The Purpose of Collection and the Lawful Basis
subCategories.content:
We have set out below, in a table format, a description of all the ways we plan to use your Personal Data and on which lawful bases we rely on to do so. We shall only process your Personal Data if we have your consent for the specific purpose of the processing or if the processing has a lawful bases as set forth in Applicable Laws. These legal bases are, where the processing is necessary :

    1. for the performance of an agreement with you;
    2. for our legitimate interests;
    3. to comply with a legal obligation;
    4. to protect your vital interest;
    5. to carry out a task in the public interest; and
    6. for historical, statistical, journalistic, literature and are or scientific research.

Please note that we may process your personal data for more than one lawful ground depending on the specific purpose for which we are using your data.

subCategories.title: Lawful Basis for processing your information
subCategories.content:
In compliance with the relevant local and international data protection laws, we will only process your information in accordance with any of the lawful basis provided for under these laws which include:

  1. The performance of an agreement with you;
  2. Betika’s legitimate business interests;
  3. Compliance with any mandatory legal obligations;
  4. Your consent;
  5. Your vital interest; and
  6. Public interest.

subCategories.title: Special Categories of Personal Data
subCategories.content:
Through your interaction with any of the Betika Services, premises, or our Channels, we may collect Sensitive Personal Data about you to the extent that the same is necessary for the full and proper operation of the Betika Services that we offer to you

Should we wish to process your Sensitive Personal Data, we shall seek your specific consent first and ensure that the processing is necessary for:

  1. :
    1. the establishment, exercise or defence of a legal claim;
    2. the purposes of carrying out our or your obligations and exercising our or your specific rights; or
    3. protecting your vital interests or the vital interests of another person if you are legally incapable of giving consent.

subCategories.title: Retention of Information
subCategories.content:
We shall only retain your Personal Data for as long as reasonably necessary to fulfil the purposes we collected it for, unless our retention is:

  1. required or authorized by law or reasonably necessary for a lawful purpose, for instance for the purposes of satisfying any legal, regulatory, tax, accounting or reporting requirements;
  2. Authorized or consented by you for any reason, including for the purposes of carrying out any obligation to you under an agreement with Betika; or
  3. For historical, statistical, journalistic literature and art or research purposes.

We may retain your Personal Data for a longer period in the event of a complaint or if we reasonably believe there is a prospect of litigation in respect of our relationship with you.

To determine the appropriate retention period for personal data, we shall consider:

  1. the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the Personal Data;
  2. the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure of your Personal Data;
  3. the purposes for which we process your Personal Data and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means; and
  4. the need to comply with our internal policy and the applicable legal, regulatory, tax, accounting or other requirements.

We shall delete, erase, anonymize or pseudonymize your Personal Data that is not necessary to be retained at the expiry of the retention period.

subCategories.title: Disclosure of Information
subCategories.content:
Any disclosure of your Personal Data shall be in accordance with applicable law and regulations.

We may disclose your Personal Data to:

  1. law-enforcement agencies, regulatory authorities, courts, or other statutory authorities in response to a demand issued with the appropriate lawful mandate and where the form and scope of the demand is compliant with the law;
  2. our subsidiaries, associates, partners, merchants, or agents who are involved in delivering Betika products and Services you subscribe to or use;
  3. third parties to whom we may choose to sell, transfer or merge parts of our business or our assets or to whom we may seek to acquire our businesses or merge with;
  4. fraud prevention and anti-money laundering agencies;
  5. publicly available and/or restricted government databases to verify your identity information in order to comply with regulatory requirements;
  6. survey agencies that conduct surveys on behalf of Betika; and
  7. any other person that we are lawfully permitted to share the data with.

subCategories.title: Commercial Use of Data and Direct Marketing
subCategories.content:
We shall obtain your express consent prior to using your Personal Data for commercial purposes, unless we are authorized under any written law to use your Personal Data for commercial purposes, and we have informed you of such authorization when collecting the data from you.

We shall where possible, anonymize any Personal Data that we use for commercial purposes in such a manner as to ensure that you are no longer identifiable.

We shall obtain your express consent prior to disclosing your Personal Data with any third party for direct marketing purposes. In particular:

  1. you may be required to opt-in or give any other form of explicit consent before receiving marketing messages from us;
  2. you have the right to request us to stop sending you marketing messages at any time by:
    1. writing to us or contacting us through our contacts provided in clause 20;
    2. checking or unchecking relevant boxes to adjust your marketing preferences; or
    3. following the opt-out links on any marketing message sent to you.

subCategories.title: Cookies
subCategories.content:
Cookies are files with small amount of data that are commonly used as an anonymous unique identifier. These are sent to your browser from our Channels that you visit and are stored on your phone/computer. Subject to your consent, we shall use cookies for the following purposes:

  1. to identify your preferred language so that it can be automatically selected when you return to our Channels;
  2. to ensure that the bets you place are associated with your bet slip and account;
  3. to ensure that you receive any bonuses that you are eligible for; and
  4. to analyse our Channels’ traffic in order to make suitable improvements.

You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies, as you shall be informed of when you access our website through your phone/computer. Please note that if you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to access some of the features on our Channels.

subCategories.title: Access to and Updating your Information
subCategories.content: To update your information, please contact us by sending an email to the email address provided in clause 20.

subCategories.title: Safeguarding and Protection of Information
subCategories.content:
Betika has put in place appropriate technical, operational and security measures to protect and prevent your Personal Data from unauthorized access, accidental loss, destruction or alteration. In addition, we limit access to your Personal Data to those employees, agents, contractors and third parties who have a business need to know this information. They shall only process your Personal Data on our instructions and shall be subject to a duty of strict confidentiality.

We have further put in place procedures to deal with any suspected and material Personal Data breaches and shall notify you and any applicable regulator of such a breach where we are legally required to do so.

For more information on our safeguarding and security measures, please contact us with the information provided in clause 20.

subCategories.title: International Data Transfers
subCategories.content:
From time to time we may need to transfer your Personal Data outside of Kenya and outside of the country where you are registered as a Customer.

We shall only transfer your Personal Data outside of Kenya where we have your consent to do so or have a lawful basis for carrying out such a transfer.

We shall only transfer your Sensitive Personal Data outside of Kenya upon obtaining your consent and obtaining confirmation of appropriate safeguards.

We shall only transfer your Personal Data outside of the scope of the jurisdiction of the Applicable Laws and Data Protection Laws if you are registered as a Customer within those jurisdictions, in accordance with such Applicable Laws.

subCategories.title: Your Rights
subCategories.content:
Subject to legal and contractual exceptions, you have rights under Data Protection Laws in relation to your Personal Data. These are listed below:

  1. right to be informed that we are collecting Personal Data about you;
  2. right to be informed of the use to which your Personal Data is to be put;
  3. right to access the Personal Data that we hold about you and request information about how we process it;
  4. right to the correction of your Personal Data where it is false, misleading, inaccurate, or incomplete;
  5. right to the erasure of your Personal Data if it is false or misleading;
  6. Right to object and withdraw your consent to the processing of your Personal Data, we may continue to process if we have a legitimate or legal reason to do so;
  7. right to request restricted processing of your Personal Data noting that unless the data is being stored, we will only process such data with your consent or as legally obligated by any Applicable Laws or as required by a court or government authority to protect the rights of another person. We will inform you before withdrawing the restriction on processing of the personal data.; and
  8. right to data portability that is the right to receive Personal Data concerning you in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and to have such data shared with another data controller or processor in an efficient and easy manner.

If you wish to exercise any of the rights set out above, please contact us as per the information provided in clause 20.

We may need to request specific information from you to help us confirm your identity and ensure your right to access your Personal Data (or to exercise any of your other rights). This is a security measure to ensure that Personal Data is not disclosed to any person who has no right to receive it. We may also contact you to ask you for further information in relation to your request to speed up our response.

We endeavour to respond to all legitimate requests within reasonable time. Occasionally it could take us longer if your request is particularly complex or you have made a number of requests. In this case, we will notify you and keep you updated on the estimated response time.

subCategories.title: Help Contribute to the Protection of your Personal Data
subCategories.content:
You can help maintain the security of your Personal Data by undertaking the following helpful tips:

  1. do not share your phone number, ID number, account password or betting patterns (such as amounts and time) with anyone;
  2. change your account password on a regular basis;
  3. remember to sign off after visiting our Channels;
  4. inform Betika of any changes that occur in your Personal Data to facilitate maintenance of accurate and up-to-date records;
  5. do not send any of your Personal Data via non-encrypted e-mail; and
  6. do not supply your Personal Data to any website that you do not know or trust.

subCategories.title: Right to Lodge Complaint
subCategories.content: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Kenyan Data Commissioner or equivalent supervisory authority in accordance with the Applicable Laws, that operate within the country of operation where you are registered as a customer.

subCategories.title: Non-Compliance with this Privacy Policy
subCategories.content: Betika reserves the right to terminate any agreement with you for failure to comply with the provisions of this Privacy Policy and its Terms and Conditions and reject any application for information contrary to this Privacy Policy.

subCategories.title: Amendments to this Privacy Policy
subCategories.content: Betika reserves the right to amend any part of this Privacy Policy, to the extent permissible by law. Where such an amendment is made, We shall notify you via our Channels and you should check our Channels frequently to stay up to date with any recent changes. Unless stated otherwise, our current Privacy Policy applies to all Personal Data that we have about you and your account.

subCategories.title: Betika Midweek Jackpot
subCategories.content:
BETIKA MIDWEEK JACKPOT (the “Midweek Jackpot”)

  1. DEFINITIONS
    1. Double chance: this is a bet on two out of the three possible outcomes of a sports event.
    2. Service: The Service includes:
  • Betika’s Website (www.betika.com) and any other remote product We may offer from time to time (“Website”);
  • Betika’s mobile application; and
  • Betika's Tele-betting services i.e. USSD or SMS.
  1. INTRODUCTION
    1. The Betika Midweek Jackpot is a sportsbook jackpot based on fifteen (15) pre-selected football matches that is offered on our website, through SMS and via our mobile applications.
    2. A ‘winner’ is defined as a customer who meets the following criteria:
  2. correctly predicting the outcomes of all the matches at the end of the last match in the Midweek Jackpot list once the correct outcomes of all the matches have been determined and/or resulted; and
  3. placing fixed cash bets with a stake of KES 15/- per bet.
    1. A customer is not limited to the number of Mega Jackpot bets they may place.
    2. Customers are permitted to place double chance bets on each selection which means that they will be able to predict two out of the three possible outcomes of a match with one bet.
    3. For instance, a customer will have the following options in each bet:
  • 1 or X – the result is either a home win or draw; or
  • X or 2 – the result is either a draw or a win; or
  • 1 or 2 – the result is either a home win or away win.
    1. Each double chance selection shall increase the customer’s stake as demonstrated below:
    • The maximum number of double combinations allowed is five (5).
    • The total stake with n combinations can be calculated as: 2n x 49. (where n is the number of double chance bets) For example, for a 5 double chance Midweek Jackpot combination, the total stake will be calculated as follows:

25 x 15 = 480/-

  1. MIDWEEK JACKPOT PRIZE
    1. The weekly Midweek Jackpot prize is fixed at KES. 15 million to be shared among all Midweek Jackpot winner(s).
    2. In the event that there are multiple winners, Betika will settle the pro-rated amount to each winner. The amount may vary from one Midweek Jackpot event to the next depending on the number of winner(s) in each Midweek Jackpot event.
    3. At the end of the last match in the Midweek Jackpot list, once the correct outcomes of all the 15 matches have been determined and/or resulted, the Midweek Jackpot winner(s) will be the ones who have predicted 15/15 games correctly.
    4. Winners shall be required to avail themselves at Betika offices with proof of identity before any payment is made during which period we will undertake due diligence on the account activity and make inquiries with mobile money service providers, the National Police Service, the Betting Control and Licensing Board, the Ethics and Anti-Corruption Commission, the Financial Reporting Centre and the Unclaimed Financial Assets Authority among other relevant and competent government authorities. This due diligence exercise applies to all Midweek Jackpot winners and may delay the turnaround time for effecting such payments
  2. MIDWEEK JACKPOT CONSOLATION PRIZES
    1. Players with 12/15, 13/15 and 14/15 outcomes are entitled to a consolation prize. The amount of the consolation prize will be determined by Betika and such amounts shall vary amongst the different prediction levels.
  3. MIDWEEK JACKPOT RULES
    1. Midweek Jackpot bets may be placed through the following channels:
    • SMS by dialing 29090 and following the Midweek Jackpot prompts; or
    • Website (www.betika.com); or
    • Mobile applications (IOS).
    1. All Midweek Jackpot bet selections should be confirmed before placing a bet. Once submitted, Midweek Jackpot bets can only be cancelled within 15 minutes of placement; after this period, bets cannot be cancelled or amended.
    2. Midweek Jackpot bets are accepted just before the scheduled kick-off of the first football match of the Midweek Jackpot. Where we have reason to believe that a bet is placed after the outcome of an event is known, or after the selected participant or team has gained a material advantage (e.g. a score, sending off for the other team etc.) or a bet is accepted in error, the Company reserves the right to take appropriate action in accordance with our General Terms and Conditions; including but not limited to voiding the bet.
    3. Where one, two or three Midweek Jackpot games is/are cancelled, interrupted, abandoned, suspended or postponed, the Betting Control and Licensing Board’s (‘BCLB’) Operating Guidelines dictate that an official public draw shall be carried out within 48 hours from the time of end of the last game of the Midweek Jackpot, to determine the result of the missing game’s result.
    4. Where there is a dispute on the validity of a public draw or event for any reason, the result of adjudication by a Betting Control and Licensing Board (‘BCLB’) officer shall be considered as the final result or outcome of that particular event.
    5. Where more than three (3) games are cancelled, interrupted, abandoned, suspended or postponed, Betika will cancel the particular Midweek Jackpot event and refund the stake placed.
    6. If a match is abandoned or postponed from its scheduled date/time but is then rescheduled to take place no later than the advertised kick-off time of the last match on the list, then provided the match is played to completion at the re-arranged time, all selections will stand.
    7. In all cases of postponements, cancellations, suspensions of matches, the local date and time of the event is taken into account (local time). The official kick off of every match is the last officially published time by Betika on www.betika.com . Therefore, any subsequent time published, supersedes any previous published time and is henceforth considered the new official kick off time of the match.
    8. Betika reserves the right to use the names, radio recordings, motion and still images of the winner or winners, for purposes of publicity, marketing campaigns and administering this competition.
    9. The winner(s) consent to the use of their name, image, likeness, voice and biographical material about them in connection with any and all footage, publicity and related promotional material and for any and all publicity and promotional purposes in respect of the Midweek Jackpot. The winner(s) shall expressly release Betika, its directors, officers, agents, employees, consultants, licensees and assigns from and against any and all claims which you have or may have for invasion of privacy, defamation or any other cause of action arising out of the production, distribution, broadcast or exhibition of photographs, footage or any promotional materials relating to the Midweek Jackpot.
    10. Betika does not guarantee the availability of the Midweek Jackpot on all devices and channels or its availability all the time.
    11. This Midweek Jackpot is provided “as is”, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, warranties of title, non-infringement, non-interference, accuracy of data, accuracy of translation, availability, timing, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, other than those warranties which are implied by and incapable of exclusion, restriction, or modification under the laws applicable to Betika Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
  4. ACCOUNT SECURITY AND PRIVACY
    1. In the event that a customer has more than one (1) registered phone number(s) on our platforms, only one mobile number will be eligible for the payment of winning(s) to the customer.
    2. Customers are not permitted to participate in the Midweek Jackpot using another person's account or by permitting a third party to participate using their account. Should we discover that a participant is not the registered owner of the Betika account, we reserve the right to take appropriate action in accordance with our General Terms and Conditions; including but not limited to voiding the bet and suspending the customer’s account.
  5. PROHIBITED ACTS
    1. The following acts (“Prohibited Acts”) are expressly prohibited in relation to Your use of the Service and will constitute a material breach of the Terms and will invalidate all transactions where such Prohibited Acts occur:
      1. use of the service when underage
      2. fraud or attempt to defraud
      3. money laundering (including where this is linked to terrorist funding)
      4. involvement in collusion, match-fixing, or cheating of any kind
      5. placing bets:
  • which may breach the governing rules and Applicable Laws of the relevant sport or event in question; or
  • which may jeopardize the integrity of the sport or event in question; or
  • on an event that has already occurred or there is a clear indication of the likely outcome; or
  • on the basis of ‘inside information’ known to the customer and which is not in the public domain.
    1. any other criminal activity
    2. bonus or promotional abuse
    3. Where We have reason to believe that You (or Your account) are connected to Prohibited Act(s), or that You are in breach of the Terms of Your Agreement, We will have the right at our sole discretion in respect of any Betika account held by You to:
      1. refuse a bet or any part of a bet offered to us;
      2. void any accepted bets and withhold settlement (there may be other instances where we may void a bet as detailed under the specific sport/event in our rules, or otherwise as instructed by the appropriate regulator or authority);
      3. permanently close your account(s) and terminate this agreement;
      4. withhold all or part of your account balances or stakes (which will be deemed as forfeited by you);
      5. inform the applicable authorities and regulator and supply the relevant customer information.
    4. We will not be liable for any loss or damage which you may incur as a result of any Prohibited Acts. You agree to cooperate in any investigation in respect of Prohibited Acts.
    5. You agree to use the Service, including all features and functionalities associated therewith, in accordance with all Applicable Laws, rules and regulations, or other restrictions on use of the Service or content therein. You agree not to archive, reproduce, distribute, modify, display, perform, publish, license, create derivative works from, offer for sale, or use (except as explicitly authorized in these terms and conditions) content and information contained on or obtained from or through the Service. You also agree not to: circumvent, remove, alter, deactivate, degrade, or thwart any of the content protections in the Service; use any robot, spider, scraper or other automated means to access the Service; decompile, reverse engineer, or disassemble any software or other products or processes accessible through the Service; insert any code or product or manipulate the content of the Service in any way; or use any data mining, data gathering or extraction method. In addition, you agree not to upload, post, e-mail or otherwise send or transmit any material designed to interrupt, destroy, or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment associated with the Service, including any software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs. We may terminate or restrict your use of our service if you violate these terms or are engaged in illegal or fraudulent use of the service.
  1. PALPABLE ERRORS
    1. While every effort is made to ensure there are no errors or omissions in respect of our products and services, the nature of human error or system problems means such circumstances may arise. A non-exhaustive list of “obvious errors” is outlined below:
  • Odds or terms of a bet or game wager have been misquoted as a result of human error (for example, information being inputted incorrectly, or markets being set up incorrectly) or due to computer malfunction;
  • A bet is accepted at a price or market condition which is significantly different from those available in the market at the time the bet was placed;
  • In the context of normal betting business, and the probability of the event occurring, a bet is accepted at a price which is obviously incorrect;
  • Bets have continued to be accepted on a market which should have been suspended, or the market has already closed, or has been postponed, which are sometimes referred to as “late bets”;
  • The amount of winnings, returns or promotional benefits or bonuses paid to you are miscalculated as a result of human error or computer malfunction;
  • Where winnings are so obviously incorrect or materially different to those available in the market that this is a clear error or omission e.g., the price is recorded as 100-1 or the margins for handicap betting have been reversed;
  • An error has resulted from Prohibited Acts;
  • In accordance with product rules, where a bet should not have been accepted, and If such circumstances arise, we reserve the right (and at our sole discretion) to cancel the bet and either:
  1. Correct the error on the bet placed and resettle the bet at the correct price or terms which were (or should have been) available to Us when the bet was placed; or;
  2. Declare the bet void and return the stake to Your account where correction is not reasonably practicable.; and
  3. Take any further reasonable steps and actions deemed necessary by Betika to remedy the error, loss, or damages that Betika stands to suffer as a result of an error leading to an incorrectly accepted bet.
    1. If funds are incorrectly credited to your account as a result of an error or omission (or otherwise any sum is incorrectly credited to your account):
  • You are obligated to notify us as soon as reasonably possible and in any event in no more than four (4) days;
  • We reserve the right to deduct or reverse any incorrectly applied funds from your account. Where such funds have been withdrawn by You, We may demand that you make a full refund to Us and may take other recovery measures such as automatically debiting Your account whenever it has a positive balance.
    1. If you use incorrectly credited funds to place bets, we reserve the right to void all such related bets and reverse any winnings.
    2. If incorrect stakes are deducted from your account:
  • You are obliged to notify us as soon as reasonably possible and in any event in no more than four (4) days;
  • We reserve the right to void all such bets and reverse any winnings;
  • If bets are placed using winnings related to bet(s) on which incorrect stakes were deducted, we reserve the right to void such bets placed and reverse any winnings.
    1. In respect of any reversals, if no such funds are available in your account to make good any funds deficit resulting from the reversal (for example, where the funds have been withdrawn by you), we reserve the right to recover such funds from you (with interest at market rates) on demand. If necessary, we are permitted to off-set any subsequent amounts you deposit or win with us to make good this liability.
    2. Errors relating to Prohibited Acts will be handled in accordance with these terms.
    3. We shall not be liable for any loss of winnings (or other loss) following errors or omissions by us or you.
  1. GENERAL CLAUSES
    1. All other Terms and Conditions (including all applicable policies) on the Betika domain apply to the use of the Midweek Jackpot. In case of a conflict between these promotion terms and the general terms and conditions, the general terms and conditions will apply.
    2. In case of the occurrence of any Prohibited Acts, Betika may take such action as it deems necessary in the circumstances, including but not limited to voiding any winnings or transactions, suspending an account, limiting withdrawals, and/or blocking an IP address(es).

subCategories.title: Shikisha Bet
subCategories.content:
This is a bet customizing betting tool that lets you to create your winning combination then place your pre-match bet on soccer events.

Shikisha bet rules

∙ The Minimum Bet amount is Kshs. 1, maximum is Kshs. 20,000

∙ You can combine all markets in the same or different matches. There’s no limit on markets that can be included on a Shikisha bet

∙ Customers are not permitted to make the same selection more than once in each Shikisha betslip

∙ You cannot combine a Shikisha Bet with normal bets

∙ You can only use Shikisha Bet for pre-match bets

∙ All Shikisha Bets are resulted real time

∙ If a market in a Shikisha bet is void, the affected market will be settled with an odd of 1.0 and the rest of the active markets within the Shikisha bet will be settled. ∙ The following markets in Shikisha Bet i.e. “Player to Score, First Yellow Card, Which Player will Score First, GG/NG, Over/U, Total Number of Cards” are resulted after 90 minutes ∙ The Total number of corner kicks as well as the first corner kick markets respectively are resulted at the end of the regular time of play (90 minutes plus any added time) which does not include extra time.

∙ When there are no yellow cards or corner kicks, that market is void ∙ All results are from official competition Websites e.g. the EPL website ∙ Betika reserves the right to reverse the settlement of a Shikisha Bet if the bet or a selection within the bet is settled in error.

∙ Betika reserves the right to accept or decline any bet requested for any competition or market or bet type that is included in the Shikisha Bet feature.

∙ Betika reserves the right to amend, suspend or remove the Shikisha bet feature (or any part of it) at any time for any event, fixture, market or customer.

subCategories.title: Virtual General Terms
subCategories.content:
VIRTUALS GENERAL TERMS

General Terms

Introduction

These are virtual games that allow a user to place bets on various virtual games which include football leagues, number games, races, and a variety of crash games.

All players who bet on the same virtual matches will see the same outcome.

All match simulations are created through a combination of Artificial Intelligence and independent random number generators.

In Consultation with BCLB, Betika reserves the right to void any winnings, and take any and all remedial action in instances including but not limited to:

  • System or software malfunction or error;
  • Breach of these terms, or breach of Betika General Terms and Conditions; or
  • Suspicion that there are Prohibited Activities being undertaken.

In case of the occurrence of any Prohibited Activities, Betika may take such action as it deems necessary in the circumstances, including but not limited to voiding any winnings or transactions, suspending an account, limiting withdrawals, and/or blocking an IP address(es).

Where there is a dispute regarding this product, the adjudication and decision of the Betting Control and Licensing Board (‘BCLB’) shall be final.

Betika does not guarantee the availability of the Virtual Games on all devices and channels or their availability at all times.

These terms may be cancelled or amended from time to time by Betika in consultation with BCLB.

Betika reserves the right to withdraw the Virtual Games at any time without notice.

By participating in the Virtual Games, the players agree to adhere to and be bound by these Terms.

Betika Virtual Games are provided “as is”, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, warranties of title, non-infringement, non-interference, accuracy of data, accuracy of translation, availability, timing, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, other than those warranties which are implied by and incapable of exclusion, restriction, or modification under the laws applicable to Betika’s General Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

These terms are subject to the Betika General Terms and Conditions available here. Where there is an inconsistency with these terms and the General Terms and Conditions, the latter shall prevail.

How to Play

  1. Go to betika.com and select your preferred virtual Game from the ‘Virtuals’ option.
  2. Select an available football event.
  3. Select your preferred bet option for all available matches and click on the odds on the bet you wish to place.
  4. The betslip with your selection will open and once you have made all your selections, enter your stake in the bet slip and click on 'Place Bet'.
  5. After Confirmation, your bet will be placed.

To see the list of your Virtual bets, please go to https://www.betika.com/en-ke/, Click on My Bets and select ‘Virtuals’. You will find a list of all virtual bets you have placed.

Golden Race games (Keno, Grey Hounds, Horse Race and Instant Games) have a unique feature denoted by (?) symbol, that is displayed on the game. This feature provides a comprehensive guide to the game rules and instructions.

Betting Rules

Betting is allowed before kick-off countdown runs out on the virtual sport. Betting options for future match days of the current event remain open.

ProviderMin StakeMax StakeMax Win Per BetMax Win Per Day
Golden RaceKSH 5KSH 200,000KSH 1.5MKSH 1.5M
KironKSH 10KSH 200,000KSH 1.5MKSH 1.5M
BetradarKSH 1KSH 200,000KSH 1.5MKSH 1.5M
Kiron (LigiBigi)KSH 10KSH 200,000KSH 1.5MKSH 1.5M

Where the system generates winnings in excess of the allowed maximum limit, any amount above this limit will be regarded as void and not validly due and payable.

Virtual Football Markets

  • Final Result: Who will win the match? Place a bet predicting whether the Home Team will win, a Draw will occur, or the Away Team will win (1 = Home Team, X = Draw, 2 = Away Team).
  • Double Chance: Place a bet on two of three possible exclusive outcomes. You can win the bet only when one of two predictions are correct.
    • 1/X: Winning bet if the Home Team wins or if there is a Draw
    • X/2: Winning bet if there is a Draw, or the Away Team wins.
    • 1/2: Winning bet if the Home Team wins, or the Away Team wins
  • Halftime/Fulltime: Bet on the predictions of halftime and fulltime results of the match. You can win the bet only when both predictions are correct. (Selections: 1/1, 1/X, 1/2, X/1, X/X, X/2, 2/1, 2/X, 2/2)
  • Goal Goal/No Goal: Predict whether both teams will score (Goal Goal) or not (No Goal).
  • Over/Under: Bet on the total number of goals being over or under a number (e.g., 1.5).
  • 1X2+Over/Under: Combined prediction of the end result and total goals (e.g., Home + over 1.5 = Home wins and over 1.5 goals).
  • Total Goals: Predict the total number of goals scored in a match.
  • Correct Score: Predict the exact final score (Home-Away, e.g., 1-0).
  • Multigoal: Bet on the range within which the number of goals scored falls (e.g., 0-2).
  • Asian Handicap: Bet on a team winning after applying a handicap (e.g., -1 means the team must win by 2 or more goals to win the bet).

subCategories.title: Deposit Cash Back Bonus
subCategories.content:
This is a bonus awarded daily for a customer’s first deposit(s) for the day where Betika shall refund full or partial transaction charges as bonus. The reimbursement criteria are as below:

  • Deposits of between Ksh 1-49 get Ksh 3 as bonus once a day.
  • Deposits of between Ksh 50-98 get Ksh 5 as bonus once a day.
  • Deposits of Ksh 99 get Ksh 8 as a bonus up to a limit of 2 times per day.
  • Deposits of between Ksh 100- 200 get a flat rate of Ksh 5 as bonus once a day.
  • Deposits of Ksh 201 and above ; status quo remains in regards to the bonus.

This bonus cannot be redeemed for cash.

The bonus can only be used to place a bet with a minimum total odd of 4.99.

The winnings from this bet can be redeemed.

subCategories.title: Betika EPL Quiz
subCategories.content:
BETIKA EPL QUIZ

Betika’s English Premier League© Quiz (hereinafter referred to as the “EPL Quiz” or the “Competition”) will run from 21st August 2021 to 22nd May 2022 (all days inclusive).

The EPL Quiz shall be published on one (1) day, out of each game week. The specific day, within each particular game week, on which the EPL© Quiz shall be published shall be determined by Betika at our absolute discretion.

HOW IT WORKS

Only registered Betika customers with a legitimate Facebook account will be eligible for this Competition.

Eligible Customers stand a chance of winning a cash prize for the top three participants in each round of Competition.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE COMPETITION.

  1. Betika shall publish ten (10) multiple choice questions themed around the history of the English Premier League©, through a microsite whose link shall be made available through Betika’s official Facebook page.
  2. The Quiz will be made available to Customers who click the live link and access the questions for a limited time period of fifteen (15) minutes.
  3. Betika will time each Customer’s response and the winners of the competition will be determined through their speed and accuracy of answers, that is, the quick response and submission of correct answers to the questions provided in the quiz.
  4. In the event that there is a tie in points, the participant with the fastest response time shall appear first on the list.
  5. The cash prizes for winners of the competition are as follows:
    1. 1st Place - KES 10,000/-;
    2. 2nd Place- KES 6,000/-; and
    3. 3rd Place –KES 4,000/-.

  7. Betika retains the right to carry out any background checks to confirm the authenticity of a Customer’s Betika account and Facebook account.
  8. Betika does not guarantee the availability of this Quiz on all devices and channels or its availability all the time.

This Quiz is provided “as is”, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, warranties of title, non-infringement, non-interference, accuracy of data, accuracy of translation, availability, timing, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, other than those warranties which are implied by and incapable of exclusion, restriction or modification under the laws applicable to Betika’s General Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
  10. All other terms and conditions (including all applicable policies) on the Betika domain apply to the use of this competition. In case of a conflict between these promotion terms and the General Terms and Conditions, the General Terms and Conditions will apply.

subCategories.title: Winter Drops & Wins Terms of use
subCategories.content:
WINTER DROPS & WINS Terms of use

  1. SLOT GAMES
  2. The Winter Drops & Wins promotion (the “Promotion”) is only applicable to bets placed on the casino landing page under the “drops and wins” tab and is applicable to both live games and slot games.
  3. The qualifying games are subject to change on a monthly basis, where customers would have to confirm under the “drops and wins” tabs in real time before placing a bet.
  4. There customers are eligible for 2 types of cash prizes:
    • Prize multiplier; and/or
    • Normal cash prize.
  5. The cash prizes are awarded both on a daily and weekly basis.
  6. The Kshs 125,000,000 is a prize pool and not a single prize as is, the Promotion is between on November 17th 2021 and 9th February 2022.
      1. PRIZE MULTIPLIER (17th November 2021-15th December 2021)

Weekly tournament

  • The prize multiplier is applicable every week throughout the period of the Promotion.
  • In order for a customer to be eligible for the prize multiplier award, they would need to join or play any of the games under the “drops and wins” tab of Betika’s casino landing page (‘Qualifying games’).
  • There is no minimum bet amount for the prize multiplier tournament.
  • To qualify for the weekly tournament, a customer must place a real money bet (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) on any of the Qualifying games and must get at least one (1) in-game win.
  • A Customer’s score would be computed by determining the higher value between the amount the Customer wins in one single spin relative to the Customer’s bet amount or stake.
  • The prizes will be distributed to Customers based on the final score showed on the in-game leaderboard by the end of each weekly tournament.

Daily tournament

  • In order for a customer to be eligible for the prize multiplier award, they would need to join or play any of the Qualifying games under the “drops and wins” tab of Betika’s casino landing page.
  • A Customer must spin at least one (1) real money spin on any of the Qualifying games.
  • Any real money bet (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) placed on any of the qualifying games qualifies a Customer for the award of one (1) random prize from the prize pool during the Promotion period.

      1. NORMAL CASH PRIZE (15th December 2021-12th January 2022)

Weekly tournament (normal weeks)

  • In order for a customer to be eligible for the prize multiplier award, they would need to join or play any of the Qualifying games under the “drops and wins” tab of Betika’s casino landing page.
  • The minimum bet amount for the weekly cash prize tournament is Kshs. 65/-
  • To qualify for the weekly tournament, a customer must place a real money bet (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) bet/spin on any of the Qualifying games.
  • A Customer’s score would be computed by determining the higher value between the amount the Customer wins in one single spin relative to the Customer’s bet amount or stake.
  • The prizes will be distributed to Customers based on the final score showed on the in-game leaderboard by the end of each weekly Tournament.

Daily tournament (normal weeks)

  • In order for a customer to be eligible for the prize multiplier award, they would need to join or play any of the Qualifying games under the “drops and wins” tab of Betika’s casino landing page.
  • A Customer must spin at least one (1) real money (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) spin on any of the qualifying games.
  • The minimum bet amount for the daily cash prize tournament is Kshs. 65/-
  • Any real money (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) spin/bet placed on any of the Qualifying games qualifies a Customer for the award of one (1) random prize from the prize pool during the Promotion period.

  1. LIVE GAMES

Weekly tournaments

The minimum bet amounts for the weekly live game tournaments are enumerated below:

  • Weekly Roulette Tournament: KSH 65
  • Weekly Blackjack Tournament: KSH 1300
  • Weekly Baccarat Tournament: KSH 130

A win qualifier (hereinafter a “Qualifying Win”) is used to determine if a Customer’s win is considered a Qualifying Win in the respective weekly tournament.

Qualifying win means that each consecutive win needs to be greater than 2x of the total bet/stake being placed.

Weekly Roulette tournament rules:

        • In order for a Customer to be eligible for the weekly Roulette, they must place a real money bet (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) on any of the participating weekly Roulette tournament games (‘Qualifying games’).
    • A Customer must receive a minimum of two (2) consecutive Qualifying Wins, where each consecutive Qualifying Win is greater than two times (2x) of the total bet to qualify for weekly Roulette tournament.
    • A Customer may increase their weekly Roulette tournament score upon every additional consecutive Qualifying Win.
    • Any stakes placed on bets with 1:1 odds (Red/Black, Odd/Even, 1:18/19:36) shall not be counted or qualify towards a customer’s weekly Roulette tournament score.
    • The prizes will be distributed to Customers based on the final score showed on the in-game leaderboard by the end of each weekly Roulette tournament.

Weekly Blackjack tournament rules:

      • In order for a customer to be eligible for the weekly Blackjack tournament, they must place a real money bet (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) on any of the participating weekly Blackjack tournament games.
      • A Customer must receive a minimum of two (2) Consecutive Qualifying Wins, where each consecutive Qualifying Win is greater than one time (1x) of the total bet to qualify for the weekly Blackjack tournament.
      • A Customer may increase their weekly Blackjack tournament score upon every additional consecutive Qualifying Win.
      • Only main bets and/or bets behind may be considered for the weekly Blackjack tournament. Any bets placed on side bets will not be counted towards weekly Blackjack tournament score.
      • The prizes will be distributed to Customers based on the final score showed on the in-game leaderboard by the end of each weekly Blackjack tournament.

Weekly Baccarat tournament rules:

      • In order for a customer to be eligible for the weekly Baccarat tournament, they must place a real money bet (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) on any of the participating weekly Baccarat tournament games.
      • A Customer must receive a minimum of two (2) consecutive Qualifying Wins where each consecutive Qualifying Win is greater than one time (1x) of the total bet to qualify for the weekly Baccarat tournament.
      • A Customer may increase their weekly Baccarat tournament score upon every additional consecutive Qualifying Win.
      • Only main Bets (Customer, Banker and Tie) may be considered for a customer’s weekly Baccarat tournament score. Bets placed on side bets will not be counted towards a customer’s weekly Baccarat tournament score
    • The prizes will be distributed to Customers based on the final score showed on the in-game leaderboard by the end of each weekly Baccarat tournament.

Daily prize drops

  • Each week within the period of the Promotion includes seven (7) daily prize drops (each a “Daily Prize Drop Day”).
  • Any real money bet (deposited into the Customer’s Betika wallet) placed on any of the qualifying games qualifies a Customer for the award of one (1) random prize from the prize pool during the Promotion period.
  • The minimum bet amount for the daily prize drop is Kshs. 65/-
  • A customer may win multiple daily prize drops on each daily prize drop day.

subCategories.title: Morning Glory Ki-Betika Promotion
subCategories.content:
MORNING GLORY KI-BETIKA PROMOTION

WHAT IS IT?

Morning Glory Ki-Betika (hereinafter the ‘Promotion’) is a promotion by Betika running every weekday (Monday to Friday inclusive) (hereinafter referred to as “Qualifying Days”).

These terms and conditions apply exclusively to this Promotion.

HOW IT WORKS

To qualify for the award of the net stake back as a free bet, a customer must:

  1. Stake at least KES. 69/- on a cash multibet;
  2. Have a minimum of 4 selections/picks in the multibet;
  3. Bet with odds greater than 4.99;
  4. Bet between 6am and 9am(inclusive) on any of the Qualifying Days; and
  5. Lose the bet.

A bet will be referred to as a Qualifying Bet if it meets ALL the conditions demonstrated in points 1 to 5 above.

TERMS & CONDITIONS

  • The Promotion shall only be applicable to a customer’s first Qualifying Bet on each Qualifying Day;
  • The value of each free bet awarded is computed as the stake of the customer after applicable statutory deductions and is capped at KES. 100/- regardless of a customer’s stake;
  • Cancelled cash bets and cashed-out bets are not eligible for the award of a free bet;
  • The free bet shall only be awarded after all the games/events in the multibet have been resulted in accordance with our General Terms and Conditions;
  • The free bet awarded can only be utilized to bet on sportsbook, pre-match and live games;
  • In utilizing the free bet, a customer must place a bet with odds greater than 4.99;
  • The free bet awarded will have a validity period of 24 hours, after which, if not utilized, will automatically expire.
  • The Promotion is available on lite, desktop, mobile web, mobile app platforms only;
  • This Promotion is provided “as is”, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, warranties of title, non-infringement, non-interference, accuracy of data, accuracy of translation, availability, timing, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, other than those warranties which are implied by and incapable of exclusion, restriction or modification under the laws applicable to Betika Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy;
  • All other Terms and Conditions (including all applicable policies) on the Betika domain apply to the use of the Promotion. In case of a conflict between these Promotion terms and the General Terms and Conditions, the General Terms and Conditions will apply; and
  • In case of the occurrence of any Prohibited Acts, Betika may take such action as it deems necessary in the circumstances, including but not limited to voiding any winnings or transactions, suspending an account, limiting withdrawals, and/or blocking an IP address(es).

subCategories.title: Bet Share
subCategories.content:
BETSHARE TERMS AND CONDITIONS (Betshare)

How It Works

Only registered Betika Customers are eligible to participate.

Persons without a Betika account who would like to participate in Betshare are required to register as Betika Customers and thereafter, login, place a bet and share your bet via including but not limited to SMS and social media networks including WhatsApp, Facebook, Telegram and Twitter platforms, by clicking on the share button on the bet-slip.

Terms of Use

  1. Party A (the Sharer) MUST be a Betika customer.
  2. Party B (the Recipient) is a Betika customer who has received the link shared.
  3. The Recipient may be an existing customer or a new customer who signs up, makes a deposit, and places the shared bet.
  4. For a shared bet to qualify, the following conditions must be met:
  5. The minimum odds on Primary Shared Bet (a bet placed by the sharer) is 4.99;
  6. The minimum stake on Primary Shared Bet – KES 25/- cash bet;
  7. The minimum odds on a Secondary Shared Bet (a bet placed by the recipient) is 4.99;
  8. The minimum stake on Secondary Shared Bet is – KES 25/- Cash Bet; and
  9. The “share” button displayed on the webpage will only be available after placing the bet.
  10. Only cash bets are eligible for placing as the stake. Bonuses are not eligible.
  11. Only a maximum of two (2) bets from one customer account will qualify to be added to the leaderboard.
  12. The more times the Primary Shared Bet is shared by the recipient(s), the higher the ranking of the Sharer.
  13. The leaderboard is a live tally of the customer(s) rankings according to their qualified shared bets. The leaderboard is displayed and updated in real-time and accessible on https://leaderboard.betika.com/.
  14. Only settled bets qualify to be added to the leaderboard.
  15. The prizes will be awarded weekly to the top 100 bet-share participants with the highest number of qualified shared.
  16. The first winner will receive a cash prize award of KES 300,000/-.
  17. The second winner will receive a cash prize award of KES. 150,000/-.
  18. The third winner will receive a cash prize award of KES 100,000/-.
  19. The 4th to 10th winners will each receive a cash prize award of KES 20,000/-.
  20. The 11th to 20th winners will each receive a cash prize award of KES. 15,000/-.
  21. The 21st to 50th winners will each receive a cash prize award of KES. 10,000/-.
  22. The 51st to 100th winners will each receive a cash prize award of KES. 8,000/-.
  23. The winnings will be credited to the customer’s wallet within twenty-four (24) hours after the announcement of the winners.
  24. Betika does not guarantee the availability of the Betshare functionality on all devices and channels or its availability all the time.
  25. Betshare is provided “as is”, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, warranties of title, non-infringement, non-interference, the accuracy of data, the accuracy of the translation, availability, timing, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, other than those warranties which are implied by and incapable of exclusion, restriction or modification under the laws applicable to Betika Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
  26. All other Terms and Conditions (including all applicable policies) on the Betika domain apply to Betshare. In the event of a conflict between these Terms of Use and the General Terms and Conditions, the General Terms and Conditions will apply.
  27. In case of the occurrence of any Prohibited Acts, Betika may take such action as it deems necessary in the circumstances, including but not limited to voiding any winnings or transactions, suspending an account, limiting withdrawals, and/or blocking an IP address(es).

subCategories.title: 500% Lost Multibet Freebet Bonus
subCategories.content:
500% LOST MULTIBET FREEBET BONUS

Definitions

  • Reference to “You” “Your” the “Player” or “Customer(s)” is reference to any person using Betika’s services across all available channels, which include our website.
  • Free bet: This is a non-cash consolation prize that is granted to a customer by Betika. The free bet shall be reflected in a customer’s free bet wallet and may be used to place bets or converted to cash under certain circumstances which are determined by Betika from time to time.
  • Reference to “Channels” is reference to all available platforms or Devices used to access the Service.

How it Works

  • The Lost Multibet Freebet bonus is applicable to all customers who place cash multi-bets with a minimum of eight (8) selections in each bet slip on sportsbook events (pre-match and/or live).

  • There will be no minimum odds required to place your bet with Lost Multibet Freebet bonus.

subCategories.title: General Terms And Conditions
subCategories.content:
Introduction

  • A Crash Game is a game that involves a multiplier increasing steadily until it simply stops or crashes. All of our Crash Games can be found in the Crash Lobby on our website.
  • The action of crashing can be symbolised by different elements that are defined in each Crash Game. A plane flying away, a car crashing, a meteorite exploding, a growing graph line, and other actions as per the game specifications.
  • Betika has multiple Crash Games under its product portfolio; Aviator, Comet Crash, Spaceman, Big Bass Crash, Buruka, Jet X, Aviatrix and many more.
  • Crash Games are multiplayer games where more than one player can play the same game at the same time.
  • All players playing Crash Games at the same time, will see the same results, wherever they are, provided that they are able to access our channels/platforms.
  • In the event that a Customer is not registered or logged into their account, the Crash Games will be available only in the demo version.

How to Play

  • Go to www.betika.com and select your preferred Crash Game from the Crash Lobby.
  • There are two ways of playing Crash Games, either manually or using auto mode.
  • To begin playing, enter your selected stake amount and click ‘BET’.
  • The further the crash multiplier goes, the higher the multiplier.
  • Click ‘CASH OUT’ before it reaches the crash point to win the game.
  • If the game reaches the crash point before you cashout you lose the game.
  • More instructions on how to play are held within the Crash Game.
  • Each Crash Game has unique features that can be discovered when playing the game as well as the ‘how to play’ instructions within each Crash Game.

Betting Rules

  • The minimum stake per bet on Crash Games varies from KSH 1 – KSH 10.00.
  • The maximum stake on Crash Games is KSH 20,000.
  • The maximum amount of winning(s) on Crash Games is KSH 1,500,000 per bet.
  • The maximum amount of winnings that may be paid out to a player per calendar day on Aviator is KSH 3,500,000,
  • The maximum amount of winnings that may be paid out to a player per calendar day on all other Crash Games is KSH 1,500,000,
    • A calendar day refers to a 24-hour period starting at 00h00 - 23h59 local time.
  • Where our systems generate winnings in excess of the allowed maximum limit, any amount above this limit will be regarded as void and shall not be due or payable.

subCategories.title: General Terms And Conditions
subCategories.content:
Introduction

  • Bingo is a game where players purchase virtual cards, and mark off numbers as they are called. All of our Bingo Games can be found in the Bingo & Keno Games game category on our website (www.betika.com).
  • The goal is to complete a specific pattern on the card, such as a line, diagonal, or full house and prizes are awarded based on the pattern completed.
  • Betika has multiple Bingo Games under its product portfolio; Atlantis Bingo, Banana Bingo, Bingo Halloween and more.
  • Bingo Games often include additional features like unlocking bonus rounds, special balls or purchasing extra balls.
  • In the event that a Customer is not registered or logged into their account, the Bingo Games will be available only in the demo version.

Betting Rules

  • The minimum stake per bet on Bingo Games varies from KES 10 - KES 40
  • The maximum stake on Bingo Games varies from KES 400 – KES 5000
  • The maximum amount of winning(s) on Bingo Games is KES 2,000,000 per bet.
  • The maximum amount of winnings that may be paid out to a player per calendar day on Bingo Games is KES 2,500,000
    • A calendar day refers to a 24-hour period starting at 00h00 - 23h59 local time.
  • Where the system generates winnings in excess of the allowed maximum limit, any amount above this limit will be regarded as void and not validly due and payable.

General Clauses

  1. In Consultation with BCLB, Betika reserves the right to void any winnings, and taking any and all remedial action in instances including:
    • System or software malfunction or error; or
    • Suspicion that there are Prohibited Activites being undertaken.
  2. Betika does not guarantee the availability of these products on all devices and channels or its availability at all times.
  3. In consultation with BCLB, these terms may be amended from time to time.
  4. These products are provided “as is”, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, warranties of title, non-infringement, non- interference, accuracy of data, accuracy of translation, availability, timing, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, other than those warranties which are implied by and incapable of exclusion, restriction, or modification under the laws applicable to Betika’s General Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
  5. These Products are subject to the General Terms and Conditions available here . Where there is an inconsistency with these terms and the General Terms and Conditions, the latter shall prevail.
